ygData.subject: Re: classes and races
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely not overlooked...my half-elf warrior was better level for level than my dark elf warrior.  It was just that being bad was so much more fun ;) ...
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely not overlooked...my half-elf warrior was better level for level
than my dark elf warrior. It was just that being bad was so much more fun
;)


-----Original Message-----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com' <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:57 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] classes and races


>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>True, I always like poking fun at my barbarian friend who has 60 int :).
>
>And Ultravision ROCKS. Theres no other way to describe it.
>
>BUT we level a lot slower.
>
>Another good class for warriors that people overlook is the half-elf. 80
>str 80 stam 120agil 80 dex 75 in all other stats (assuming you put all you
>skills into agil).
>
>> ----------
>> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
>> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Sent: Saturday, May 22, 1999 12:09 AM
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] classes and races
>>
>> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>>
>> ya know why? because humans, stat-wise, pretty much suck. ie, and DE
has
>> base int of 99, human has 100 as max......DE warriors are almost as smart
>> as human casters, haha, and I always remind them of this when I see them
>> :) (assuming its day time and they are not more than 5 steps away so
they
>> can see me). And thats just an example of their pathetic inteligence,
the
>> rest of their stats are equally unimpressive.
>>
>> >>> Sean Ross <sross@...> 5.21.99 6:05:14 AM >>>
>> From: Sean Ross <sross@...>
>>
>> yes, humans in general level faster then any other race.
>>
>> schlaban yocksovik wrote:
>>
>> > From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>> >
>> > HI.
>> >
>> > I was wondering if anyone know what class is the fastest to advance
>> levels
>> > in.

>> > How about darkelves? they get more or less xp?
>> >
>> > And also, does the god you worship affect xp?
>> > I know it affects the overall diff, on the game but does it affect xp?
>> >
>> > Would be logical that if you decide to worship the prince of hate, wich
>> will
>> > increase the game diff alot, you should get more xp, is this how it
>> works?
>> >
>> > I know some of you dont want this info...so if anyone knows the answer,
>> > tag the mail with spoiler hehe
>> >
>> > thanx
>> >
>> > Vashi
